duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop an exceptional familiarity of the brand and product knowledge to provide solution-oriented, friendly service to customers.
Lead the store team to provide high-level service and engagement.
Manage floor coverage to engage the customer and drive the store experience.
Ensure accurate recording of customer profile information and proactive resolution of customer concerns.
Maintain merchandise presentation according to Visual Merchandising standards and current floor-set and product messaging.
Supervise the handling of merchandise receipts and transfers, ensuring accurate processing and visual merchandising on the sales floor.
Maintain store cleanliness and provide clear and consistent feedback to employees.
Adhere to company guidelines, policies, programs, and cash-handling and reporting functions.
Ensure store security and respond to alarms as directed, ensuring safety of employees and customers.
Work in temperatures ranging from 50 - 85 degrees, use a computer up to 60% of the time throughout the day.
